author: alexandair
body:
`ExecutionPolicy` and `ConfigurationName` parameters are not valid on Linux.

```bash
$ pwsh-preview -?

Usage: pwsh[.exe] [[-File] <filePath> [args]]
                  [-Command { - | <script-block> [-args <arg-array>]
                                | <string> [<CommandParameters>] } ]
                  [-ConfigurationName <string>] [-EncodedCommand <Base64EncodedCommand>]
                  [-ExecutionPolicy <ExecutionPolicy>] [-InputFormat {Text | XML}]
                  [-Interactive] [-NoExit] [-NoLogo] [-NonInteractive] [-NoProfile]
                  [-OutputFormat {Text | XML}] [-Version] [-WindowStyle <style>]
                  [-WorkingDirectory <directoryPath>]

       pwsh[.exe] -h | -Help | -? | /?

```
title: [6.1.0-rc.1] pwsh-preview -? on Linux outputs parameters not valid for Linux
